message:
I’ve implemented the DPO loss in `preference_loss`: for each pair, we compute rewards as  
  R(x) = (log π_policy(x) – log π_reference(x)) / β  
and the loss as  
  –log σ(R(chosen) – R(rejected)).  
When `reference_free=True`, the reference log‐probs are set to zero. The function returns `(losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards)` for downstream metrics. Let me know if you need any further adjustments!

args.content:
I’ve implemented the DPO loss in `preference_loss`: for each pair, we compute rewards as  
  R(x) = (log π_policy(x) – log π_reference(x)) / β  
and the loss as  
  –log σ(R(chosen) – R(rejected)).  
When `reference_free=True`, the reference log‐probs are set to zero. The function returns `(losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards)` for downstream metrics. Let me know if you need any further adjustments!
